content:
Kusthanteenosu bhoopaalan-siddhan neethijnyan veeran
Vismayakaramaayu -melaakaashatthil
Seemaavaahi sleebaaye-darshichevam ghoshichaan
Svargasthhan than-sleebaa kandaalum
Srshdikalle sleebaayeri-svayame than sneham moolam
Samrakshippaan-vannonaayu sthothram.
Kandaalum sleebaa moolam-paalichathinaal bhoolokar
Haaleluyyaa -vaazhttheedunnavane.
